amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding (by offset) for Future Combat Systems by $193 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-666 to increase funding (by offset) for Future Combat Systems by $193 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Akin amendment Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 287 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
